sentences.en: " Why quibble about the Yankees earning an honest penny selling out the Union?
sentences.cn: " 北方佬出卖联邦赚几个老实钱,这有什么不好 啊 ?

sentences.en: A no - quibble, money - back guarantee for goods returned within 14 days of receipt.
sentences.cn: □收到后14天内退还的货物, 保证无条件退款.

sentences.en: A no - quibble, money - back guarantee for goods returned within 14 days of receipt.
sentences.cn: 收到后14天内退还的货物,保证无条件退款.

sentences.en: A quibble arose concerning the phrase break out.
sentences.cn: 关于“拉动”这个词的理解出现了分歧.

sentences.en: Do not quibble over the thing.
sentences.cn: 不要把那件事说得模棱两可.

sentences.en: Don't quibble about unimportant things with me.
sentences.cn: 别为了琐碎的小事和我狡辩.

sentences.en: Don't quibble over the money; pay her what she asks.
sentences.cn: 不要为那些钱争吵, 就照她要的数目付给她吧.

sentences.en: I’ve just got a few minor quibbles.
If you owe money to others , you have to pay. Don't quibble!
sentences.cn: 欠债还钱, 你就别说遁辞了!

sentences.en: Lawmakers spent the day quibbling over the final wording of the resolution.
sentences.cn: 立法者们花了一天争辩决议的最后措词。
我们不要再在这些小事上斗嘴了.

sentences.en: She's only introducing this as a quibble.
Still, this is a small quibble about a deeply intelligent, provocative book.
sentences.cn: 然而, 对于一本深邃理智, 富有挑战意味的书来说,这些只是细枝末节.

sentences.en: When heaven gives a sign, a wise man does not quibble.
sentences.cn: 既然老天爷给了启示, 聪明人是决不含糊的.

sentences.en: When you quarrel with a close friend, talk about main dish, don't quibble over the appetizers.
sentences.cn: 与好朋友争吵时, 要就事论事, 不要在小事上纠缠不休.

sentences.en: Why quibble ? It just amounted to pulling an inconsiderate monkey.
sentences.cn: 算了吧,直当是拉着个不通人情的猴子吧.

words.tran_cn: 推托；说模棱两可的话（quibble的ing形式）

words: prove that black is white and white black
words.tran_cn: 诡辩；挑剔；说模棱两可的话

trans.tran_cn: 吹毛求疵的反对意见或批评，遁词，模棱两可的话
trans.tran_en: a small complaint or criticism about something unimportant

trans.tran_cn: 诡辩；挑剔；说模棱两可的话
trans.tran_en: When people quibble over a small matter, they argue about it even though it is not important

trans.tran_cn: 使用遁词，含糊其辞，吹毛求疵
